main event: A witness reported sighting a blinking light that traveled and disappeared on the horizon over Kettering, Ohio on July 4, 1969.
interesting points: The witness described the object as a very bright and cloudy-looking thing with a fuzzy edge and a grayish color, resembling a small plane but making less noise.
The object moved overhead quickly and disappeared on the horizon.
The witness indicated the object may have had lights and appeared to suddenly speed up and disappear.
Other observers in the area had reported similar sightings.
The sighting lasted for about 5 minutes.
sighted object: a blinking light that traveled and disappeared on the horizon
photographs: no, the report does not include any photographs
